name: The Magic Carpet - A Virtual Reality Experience
name_original: The Magic Carpet - A Virtual Reality Experience
description:
This is soooo much fun to fly! Requires an HTC Vive to play. I will be incrementally updating this to add new features. Comment for what you'd like to see added next.

Update 1: I added primitive multiplayer support, mountains are more mountainy as well:

magic_carpet_m.zip

Help me test this out by running it, comment with suggestions or bugs reports.
